responses.rationale: Reports numerical metrics ('about 22 million birds', '1.8 million broiler chickens', etc.) using standard verbs ('kill', 'including').
Reports numerical metrics ('about 13 million chickens', '305,000 turkeys') using standard verbs ('kill', 'began').
Reports numerical metrics ('46 million chickens') and economic status ('leading egg producer') using standard verbs ('had', 'is').
Reports numerical metrics ('about 11.7 million turkeys') using a standard verb ('raises').
The segment describes the cause of disease spread, not prices, economic data, or numerical metrics.
Reports numerical metrics ('23 states') using standard verbs ('shows', 'have confirmed').
The segment reports the location of cases, not prices, economic data, or numerical metrics.
